attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am campaigning for research and funding into the illness MCS multiple chemcial sensitivity, a much ignored allergic illness.

rejection.details: Unfortunately we can not accept your petition as the title calls on the PM to 'recognise' something, which we do not consider a valid action. You may want to reword the title of your petition to make it clear what action you would like the Government to take e.g. to provide more funding, to invest in research, or to begin a publicity campaign
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
